fields.request: Manual QA: Validate admin dashboard model rule indicators
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open /admin/.
2. Confirm that the CP Configuration and CP Firmware rows display a green check icon with the 'All rules met.' message when every EVCS has at least one configuration snapshot and firmware record.
3. In a staging environment, create a temporary charger without associated CP Configuration or CP Firmware entries and reload /admin/ to verify the red cross icon appears with a message naming the missing EVCS identifier. Remove the temporary record after confirming the error state.
